website_summaries.verdict: This popular heartburn medication is a good choice for relieving mild symptoms quickly, but you may find yourself reaching for the bottle throughout the day if you have persistent symptoms.
pros: Contains calcium carbonate that neutralizes stomach acid and relieves heartburn in as little as a few seconds
Chewable tablets come in pleasant mint and fruit flavors
Available in regular, extra, and ultra strengths
cons: Relief doesn't typically last as long as what stronger medications like PPIs and H2 blockers provide

customer_reviews.title: It's TUMS. Who reviews antacids? This guy.
customer_reviews.text: Kind of tastes like fruit. I like the green ones. My 2 year old and dog like them, too. Plus 4 stars Also tastes like chalk. Minus one star. Helps when you ate too many slices of pepperoni pizza or drank too much red wine. Plus two stars. Their commercial theme song is now stuck in my head. Tum ta-tum tum TUMS!!! Minus one star.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Kuerth

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: I mean, its Tums... why wouldn't they work? I think the thing here would be that you can have them delivered instead of having to go out and get them, which was nice. they are a little bit more expensive here though than in the store locally so I suppose it just depends on your priorities and life. Flavor is good, it's the only tums flavor I can tolerate.
customer_reviews.author: JollyNova

customer_reviews.title: chewable antiacid tablets...quick relief for heartburn!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for reflux/heartburn! The container is not convenient for travel because it’s so large, but I leave the large bottle home and place a “supply” of the anti acid in a smaller container when traveling! I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kajun

customer_reviews.title: If you are seeking a pleasant tasting antacid chewable tablet check out this product.
customer_reviews.text: I do not take antacid tablets very often but now and then I get heart burn and I have used Tums in the past. I decided to order this small 48 tablet size (Tums antacid assorted fruit flavored) which I found on Amazon. I was pleased with the quick service and even though this was not bargain priced; nevertheless, I am happy with my purchase. If you are seeking a small 48 tablet size fruit flavored antacid tablet you may want to check out this product on Amazon. Rating: 4 Stars. Joseph J. Truncale (Author: The Mighty Pen: Your Self-Defense friend).
customer_reviews.author: Joseph J. TruncaleTop Contributor: Boxing

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Good value ...I’ve bought several times... But others... Other sizes by mistake and was disappointed because they weren’t as good value sure it’s a huge bottle and I don’t know why they ask you if you want to travel with it you put it in a smaller container but you can’t beat that with a baseball bat that price! When you use the most frequently as I do... Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Worker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for the family of burning hearts
customer_reviews.text: If it’s not lactose issues, it’s heartburn. So I purchased the giant size for the one always complaining so he’d never run out. Thank goodness for Subscribe and Save.
customer_reviews.author: alison859

customer_reviews.title: Lifesavers! no not the candy
customer_reviews.text: One night I had such bad heartburn I couldn't stop hiccuping and couldn't get any sleep. So I bought these. When the hiccups start the tums go to work and they go away quickly. Instantly. Too large to travel with, but a small bag would be easy to travel with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Dawg

customer_reviews.title: HUGE Bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I underestimated how big this bottle would be, you can basically knock someone out with it if you needed to! There is enough Tums in it for a small army, so whether you need it for your heartburn or a weapon... this is a good purchase :)
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Always have used tums and it’s nice having this larger size bottle, one of the questions above was for traveling, I don’t think this is a travel size bottle
customer_reviews.author: Randy P.

customer_reviews.title: Reflexive Reflux Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This should come with the positive pregnancy test and paperwork from the doctor... I had never had heartburn in my LIFE until being pregnant with my first and consecutive children. These tums taste great and legit remove the discomfort of acid reflux! Stay away from greasy, acidic foods? Lol, no way. Just pop some Tums, friend!
customer_reviews.author: FerristOfThemAll

customer_reviews.title: the TUMS did not have a lid and the seal was broken
customer_reviews.text: the TUMS did not have a lid and the seal was broken and I could not find anyway that I could return them or get them replaced or get my money back.....DO NOT BUY....IT'S DANGEROUS.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This must have been a bad batch from the factory.
customer_reviews.text: Some of the tablets were extremely hard to chew and the tablets had a displeasing chemical smell to them. Not at all what we've come to expect from Tums. We threw the whole container and the rest tablets in the garbage. Yeeek
customer_reviews.author: Jeff G

customer_reviews.title: I’m in Panama can’t get these here
customer_reviews.text: Like so many things that I need daily, I buy Tums and many other things on Amazon every month. The shipping is killing me! From Miami to Panama it’s not cheap. In that same box I think I had $39 in value and spent $29 on shipping. ! Don’t move thinking it’s cheaper to retire..it’s not.
customer_reviews.author: greg williams

customer_reviews.title: TUMS extra strength should be verified as such before you open the bottle.
customer_reviews.text: These TUMS were supposed to be extra strength and they were not. I am only just realizing this as I noticed they were not very effective. I will not go to the trouble of returning them as they have been opened. But I hope any of you will look at the label when you receive the product and return immediately. They are not what they are supposed to be: extra strength
customer_reviews.author: Selma Holo

customer_reviews.title: Knock Off Disgusting
customer_reviews.text: This did not taste like original tums. It tastes like a garbage knockoff. I spat it out immediately as it tastes horrible. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: I have never used this product until now. It works wonderfully after a meal, it eased my bloating and is a lifes-saver! I ve used Gas-X but they didn't work as well.
customer_reviews.author: C. K. Lain

customer_reviews.title: Came with no cap on the bottle
customer_reviews.text: My dad 89+ has used tums for years. I ordered these for him and the bottle came with no cap to reseal once he removed the inner seal. They will lose potency without a cap on the bottle. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Denyse Naylor

customer_reviews.title: Best for pregnant women antacid
customer_reviews.text: My wife is currently pregnant and the tums have helped her with her distaste of food. It has given her a chance to enjoy food more while been pregnant. I'll be subscribing so I never have to tell my wife we don't have.
customer_reviews.author: Keitel Millet Jr

customer_reviews.title: Yum.  Good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: I sent these as a care package to a brother who is now in college. This will for sure come in handy and help out those weekend mornings for him and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Convis

customer_reviews.title: This came with the protective seal and cap on the bottle
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned that the protective seal and cap would be missing, But I was surprised and yes, this is a big bottle and money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FLAVOR
customer_reviews.text: I must have got a bad batch because these are rock hard. Flavors are great. Sending back.
customer_reviews.author: Spicy

customer_reviews.title: No cap to seal it after you open
customer_reviews.text: I got this product yesterday but it came without a cap. It was sealed with the aluminum but it was supposed to be for someone else and I’m sure they wouldn’t like it without the cap. I hope I can find a similar cap to fit it 🤦‍♀️🤷‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Tums is always good
customer_reviews.text: We know that tums always gets the job done and that the fruity flavors are especially nice to mask the away taste that acid produces. But what I really like about this one is the container. While holding a full 48 tums, the bottle is very compact and less than 1/2 the size of the large 72 tablet bottle. This one is fairly flat font to back so it fits nicely in a purse, pocket, desk drawer or nightstand. Compare it to the size of a pack of cigarettes if you can remember what size that is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Frequent Flyer

customer_reviews.title: Not an econimical buy
customer_reviews.text: Tums work for me. Bought in a pinch, but really small bottle compared to what I usually get for the same price at Walmart

customer_reviews.text: The product it self is fine - I have been using them for years. But the price on this is to high - I thought I was getting a much larger bottle. I was in a hurry and didn't read I got 160 ultras (1000 vs 750 strength) for the same money at walmart - this bottle only had 48.
customer_reviews.author: dgcdgc

customer_reviews.title: Best value for money.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Best value. Can't say anything bad about it. I will order more when these run out.

customer_reviews.title: Mana of the gods
customer_reviews.text: Yum! What treat! I eat whatever I want and if my body doth protest- I shall reward my tastebuds with these godlike medical candies. I do wish there was more red ones though, my wife takes them all! Tums, if you're reading this: 'Redlovers'! Make that and you'll make a mint! (no pun intended)

customer_reviews.title: My bad, I should have checked size of item

customer_reviews.title: Works for heartburn and has calcium

The fruit flavors are better than the mint in terms of chalkiness and aftertaste, at least to me. I still take a calcium supplement with vitamin D, but Tums works great for the occasional heartburn and indigestion.

customer_reviews.title: Antacids

I was pleasantly surprised with these Tums. The fruit flavor makes them tolerable and actually downright enjoyable to chew. And most importantly they work. When this supply runs out I will definitely purchase more. Thanks!

product_meta.title: TUMS Antacid Chewable Tablets for Heartburn Relief 330ct, Extra Strength, Assorted Fruit
product_meta.description:
When you have heartburn, TUMS Extra Strength Assorted Fruit antacids have fast acting, extra strength relief. Don’t let heartburn keep you from enjoying all of your favorite foods TUMS chewable antacid tablets relieve heartburn, sour stomach, acid indigestion, and upset stomach associated with these symptoms, so you can have it all, without the worry. Many other heartburn medications are absorbed into the bloodstream and can take hours or days to fully work. TUMS heartburn medicine goes to work in seconds, traveling directly to the source of the heartburn. Once there, it neutralizes acid on contact, so you get the fast heartburn relief you need, exactly when you need it. TUMS Extra Strength Assorted Fruit antacids deliver 50 percent more acid neutralizing power than TUMS regular strength antacid tablets. Plus, they taste great too, giving you a delicious assorted fruit flavor. It’s no wonder TUMS heartburn medicine is America’s number one antacid Try it today to join the millions of people who have successfully treated their heartburn with TUMS antacids. Fast, effective relief is here 

Satisfaction Guarantee
If for any reason you are not satisfied with any GSK Consumer Healthcare product, GSK Consumer Healthcare will provide you with a reimbursement within 45 days of the date of purchase. Please note that because GSK is unable to control the quality of our products sold by unauthorized sellers, the Guarantee is not available for products purchased from unauthorized sellers due to potential quality issues outside GSK’s control. Please contact GSK Consumer Healthcare directly for more information.
feature_bullets: TUMS Extra Strength Assorted Fruit chewable antacids offer fast acting, extra strength heartburn relief so you can enjoy all of your favorite foods
TUMS antacid tablets relieve heartburn, sour stomach, acid indigestion, and upset stomach associated with these symptoms
Delivers 50 percent more acid neutralizing power than TUMS regular strength antacid
Comes in a delicious assorted fruit flavor and goes to work in seconds
TUMS heartburn medicine is America’s number one antacid

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
